description: Wikipedia is a free online encyclopedia with the aim to allow anyone to edit articles. Wikipedia is the largest and most popular general reference work on the Internet,and is ranked the fifth-most popular website. Wikipedia is owned by the nonprofit Wikimedia Foundation.

blocks.name: getPageByTitles
blocks.description: GetArticleByTitles module allows you to get information about a wiki and the data stored in it, such as the wikitext of a particular page, the links and categories of a set of pages.See more in readme.

args.name: titles
args.info: A list of titles to work on.Maximum number of values is 50 .

args.name: additionalProperties
args.info: Properties of pages, including page revisions and content.Property queries get various data about a list of pages.

args.name: additionalLists
args.info: Lists of pages that match certain criteria.Lists differ from properties in two aspects - instead of appending data to the elements in the pages element, each list has its own separated branch in the query element.

args.name: export
args.info: Export the current revisions of all given or generated pages.

args.name: indexPageIds
args.info: Include an additional pageids section listing all returned page IDs.

args.name: iwurl
args.info: Whether to get the full URL if the title is an interwiki link.

args.name: customParams
args.info: Additional custom query param.Like this `&key=value`.

blocks.name: getPage
blocks.description: GetPage module allows you to get information by id about a wiki and the data stored in it, such as the wikitext of a particular page, the links and categories of a set of pages.

args.name: pageIds
args.info: A list of page IDs to work on.Maximum number of values is 50 (500 for bots).

args.name: additionalProperties
args.info: Properties of pages, including page revisions and content.Property queries get various data about a list of pages.

args.name: additionalLists
args.info: Lists of pages that match certain criteria.Lists differ from properties in two aspects - instead of appending data to the elements in the pages element, each list has its own separated branch in the query element.

args.name: export
args.info: Export the current revisions of all given or generated pages.

args.name: indexPageIds
args.info: Include an additional pageids section listing all returned page IDs.

args.name: iwurl
args.info: Whether to get the full URL if the title is an interwiki link.

args.name: customParams
args.info: Additional custom query param.Like this `&key=value`.

blocks.name: getPageByRevisionId
blocks.description: getPageByRevId module allows you to get information by id about a wiki and the data stored in it, such as the wikitext of a particular page, the links and categories of a set of pages.

args.name: revIds
args.info: A list of revision IDs to work on.Maximum number of values is 50 (500 for bots).

args.name: additionalProperties
args.info: Properties of pages, including page revisions and content.Property queries get various data about a list of pages.

args.name: additionalLists
args.info: Lists of pages that match certain criteria.Lists differ from properties in two aspects - instead of appending data to the elements in the pages element, each list has its own separated branch in the query element.

args.name: export
args.info: Export the current revisions of all given or generated pages.

args.name: indexPageIds
args.info: Include an additional pageids section listing all returned page IDs.

args.name: iwurl
args.info: Whether to get the full URL if the title is an interwiki link.

args.name: customParams
args.info: Additional custom query param.Like this `&key=value`.

args.name: fileName
args.info: Example - `File:James Hetfield - Cardiff 1996.jpg`.

blocks.name: getFilesInfo
blocks.description: Returns file information and upload history.

args.name: fileNames
args.info: Which file get.

args.name: informationToGet
args.info: Which file information to get.

args.name: informationLimit
args.info: How many total results to return per request.No more than 500 (5000 for bots) allowed. Enter max to use the maximum limit.

args.name: startListingFrom
args.info: Timestamp to start listing from.

args.name: stopListingAt
args.info: Timestamp to stop listing at.

args.name: urlWidth
args.info: If iiprop=url is set, a URL to an image scaled to this width will be returned. For performance reasons if this option is used, no more than 50 scaled images will be returned.

args.name: urlHeight
args.info: Similar to iiurlwidth.

args.name: badFileContextTitle
args.info: If badfilecontexttitleprop=badfile is set, this is the page title used when evaluating the MediaWiki:Bad image list.

args.name: customParams
args.info: Additional custom query param.Like this `&key=value`.

blocks.name: getWatchList
blocks.description: Get recent changes to pages in the current user's watchlist.

args.name: username
args.info: Your username.

args.name: password
args.info: Your password.

args.name: end
args.info: The timestamp to end enumerating.

args.name: start
args.info: The timestamp to start enumerating from.

args.name: includeMultipleRevisions
args.info: Include multiple revisions of the same page within given timeframe.

args.name: wlProp

structure.name: type
structure.info: Single type of changes to show.

args.info: Which additional properties to get.

args.name: wlTypes

structure.name: type
structure.info: Single type of changes to show.

args.info: Which types of changes to show.

args.name: wlLimit
args.info: How many total results to return per request.No more than 500 (5000 for bots) allowed. Enter max to use the maximum limit.

args.name: wlToken
args.info: A security token (available in the user's preferences) to allow access to another user's watchlist.See more in readme.

args.name: wlOwner
args.info: Used along with wltoken to access a different user's watchlist.

args.name: customParams
args.info: Additional custom query param.Like this `&key=value`.

args.name: wlNamespaces
args.info: Filter changes to only the given namespaces.

blocks.name: getPagesCategories
blocks.description: List all categories the pages belong to.

args.name: pageIds
args.info: A list of page IDs to work on.Maximum number of values is 50 (500 for bots).

args.name: additionalLists
args.info: Lists of pages that match certain criteria.Lists differ from properties in two aspects - instead of appending data to the elements in the pages element, each list has its own separated branch in the query element.

args.name: export
args.info: Export the current revisions of all given or generated pages.

args.name: indexPageIds
args.info: Include an additional pageids section listing all returned page IDs.

args.name: iwUrl
args.info: Whether to get the full URL if the title is an interwiki link.

args.name: rawContinue
args.info: Return raw query-continue data for continuation.

args.name: categoriesLimit
args.info: When more results are available, use this to continue.

args.name: clShow
args.info: Which kind of categories to show.

args.name: categoryProp
args.info: Which additional properties to get for each category.

args.name: customParams
args.info: Additional custom query param.Like this `&key=value`.

blocks.name: comparePages
blocks.description: Get the difference between two pages.

args.name: username
args.info: Your username.

args.name: password
args.info: Your password.

args.name: fromTitle
args.info: First title to compare.

args.name: fromId
args.info: First page ID to compare.

args.name: fromRevisionId
args.info: First revision to compare.

args.name: fromText
args.info: Use this text instead of the content of the revision specified by fromtitle, fromid or fromrev.

args.name: fromPst
args.info: Do a pre-save transform on fromtext.

args.name: fromContentFormat
args.info: Content serialization format of fromtext.

args.name: fromContentModel
args.info: Content model of fromtext. If not supplied, it will be guessed based on the other parameters.

args.name: toTitle
args.info: Second title to compare.

args.name: toId
args.info: Second page ID to compare.

args.name: toRevisionId
args.info: Second revision to compare.

args.name: toText
args.info: Use this text instead of the content of the revision specified by totitle, toid or torev.

args.name: toRelative
args.info: Use a revision relative to the revision determined from fromtitle, fromid or fromrev. All of the other 'to' options will be ignored.

args.name: toPst
args.info: Do a pre-save transform on totext.

args.name: toContentFormat
args.info: Content serialization format of totext.

args.name: toContentModel
args.info: Content model of totext. If not supplied, it will be guessed based on the other parameters.

args.name: prop
args.info: Which pieces of information to get.

args.name: customParams
args.info: Additional custom query param.Like this `&key=value`.

blocks.name: updateMessageList
blocks.description: Edit a mass message delivery list.

args.name: username
args.info: Your username.

args.name: password
args.info: Your password.

args.name: spamList
args.info: Title of the delivery list to update.

args.name: add
args.info: Titles to add to the list.Maximum number of values is 50 (500 for bots).

args.name: remove
args.info: Titles to remove from the list.Maximum number of values is 50 (500 for bots).

blocks.name: sendEmailToUser
blocks.description: You can send email to users who have a confirmed email address.

args.name: username
args.info: Your username.

args.name: password
args.info: Your password.

args.name: target
args.info: User to send email to.Example - Rapidapi.

args.name: subject
args.info: Subject header.

args.name: text
args.info: Mail body.

args.name: copyToMe
args.info: Send a copy of this mail to me.

blocks.name: getRevisionByPageId
blocks.description: Returns revisions for a given page by id, or the latest revision for each of several pages.

args.name: pageIds
args.info: A list of page IDs to work on.Maximum number of values is 50 (500 for bots).

args.name: revisionProperty
args.info: Which properties to get for each revision.

args.name: rvTag
args.info: Only list revisions tagged with this tag.

args.name: rvuser
args.info: Only include revisions made by user.

args.name: rvsection
args.info: Only retrieve the content of this section number.

args.name: rvExcludeUser
args.info: Exclude revisions made by user.

args.name: rvlimit
args.info: Limit how many revisions will be returned.FNo more than 500 (5000 for bots) allowed. Enter max to use the maximum limit.

args.name: rvEnd
args.info: Enumerate up to this timestamp.

args.name: rvStart
args.info: From which revision timestamp to start enumeration.

args.name: customParams
args.info: Additional custom query param.Like this `&key=value`.

blocks.name: getRevisionByPageTitle
blocks.description: Returns revisions for a given page by title, or the latest revision for each of several pages.

args.name: titles
args.info: A list of titles to work on.Maximum number of values is 50 .

args.name: revisionProperty
args.info: Which properties to get for each revision.

args.name: rvTag
args.info: Only list revisions tagged with this tag.

args.name: rvuser
args.info: Only include revisions made by user.

args.name: rvsection
args.info: Only retrieve the content of this section number.

args.name: rvExcludeUser
args.info: Exclude revisions made by user.

args.name: rvlimit
args.info: Limit how many revisions will be returned.FNo more than 500 (5000 for bots) allowed. Enter max to use the maximum limit.

args.name: rvEnd
args.info: Enumerate up to this timestamp.

args.name: rvStart
args.info: From which revision timestamp to start enumeration.

args.name: customParams
args.info: Additional custom query param.Like this `&key=value`.

args.name: username
args.info: Your username.

args.name: password
args.info: Your password.

args.name: fileUrl
args.info: URL to fetch the file from.

args.name: fileName
args.info: Target filename.

args.name: comment
args.info: Upload comment. Also used as the initial page text for new files if text is not specified.

args.name: text
args.info: Initial page text for new files.
